overview:
Adria is a Developer Evangelist for SendGrid. Previous to this role she worked for six years as a technology consultant that helped companies internalize new technologies, the cloud and social media strategies online. She produces videos and online content to explain technology to the world.

Adria has appeared on the news and various media outlets due to her citizen journalism on her tech blog including The Rachel Maddow Show, NPR, Computerworld, The Associate Press, Inc.com, Black Enterprise, Pioneer Press and more.

Now living in San Francisco, the geek capital of the world, Adria continues to seek ways to make the world a more awesome place for everyone through technology.
